txt.en: Chieftain Hrungrod can be found in his throne room in Thyrstáth.\n\nYou should defeat Chieftain Hrungrod.
Defeat Chieftain Hrungrod in the keep of Thyrstáth

'Hrungrod has been repaid for his treachery, and the ice-giant chieftain's fate will serve as warning to others of his people. Revenge is best served when cold, do they say? It gets little colder than the halls of the ice-giants!'
'The ice-giant leader, Chieftain Hrungrod, lured us into a trap. It will be a tough fight for just the two of us, but I am willing to make him pay for it if you are.'

Use the summoning horn to call Hórin to your side.

You should talk to Hórin.

If Hórin is no longer with you, you can find him at Fellgát.
Call Hórin and talk to him or speak to him back at Fellgát

'We have repaid Hrungrod for his treachery, and his fate will serve as warning to others of his people. Revenge is best served when cold, do they say? It gets little colder than the halls of the ice-giants!'
'The ice-giant leader, Chieftain Hrungrod, lured us into a trap. It will be a tough fight for just the two of us, but I am willing to make him pay for it if you are.'
Chieftain Hrungrod, leader of the ice-giants, helped the Angmarim lure you into a trap.
